title: 115_hr3311
content: Individual Health Insurance Marketplace Improvement Act This bill establishes and provides funds for an individual market stabilization reinsurance programnbsp, to be administerednbsp. In each state by the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS). nbsp, Under the program,nbsp. HHS shall make reinsurance payments to health insurance issuers with respect to high-cost individuals enrolled in certain qualified health plans offered by the issuers. HHS shall award grants to states or nonprofit community-based organizations to raise awareness of, and encourage enrollment in, qualified health plans.
